main.name: Udbhav Agarwal
main.bio: Hi there! I am Udbhav! I am a rising sophomore at the University of Victoria. I have a strong full-stack background and practically spend my entire day working on React websites. For the past 2 years, I have been learning technologies such as Prisma, Graph QL, NextJS, Chakra UI, Tailwind CSS and many others.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me at udbhav.agarwal7@gmail.com

work.title: Part-Time Web Development Intern
work.description: Architect and lead developer of the gifting mechanism of a Blockchain-centric platform allowing users to directly deposit Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) in their wallets according to their brand specifications

work.title: Junior Web Developer
work.description: Lead developer of the Self-Service Portal for a Blockchain-Centric platform that enables the creation of secure Decentralized Apps (dApp) for brands/clients to create, mint and list/sell Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) via a web-based user interface
